src:
¿Qué puede ser más importante que la paz del país?: Aristegui | Video
 by Redacción AN / GS



"No podemos acostumbrarnos, no podemos permitir que, por más que han pasado tantos años de violencia extrema, no podemos admitir que nos parezca algo natural, normal, propio de algo que ya no se puede remediar", consideró la periodista.
text:
What could be more important than the peace of the country ?: Aristegui | Video
 by AN / GS Writing



"We cannot get used to it, we cannot allow that, no matter how many years of extreme violence have passed, we cannot admit that it seems to us something natural, normal, typical of something that can no longer be remedied," the journalist considered.
